channel.title: Comments on: Valentines for Seniors: A Big Hit!

item.title: By: Jim Munson
item.dc:creator: Jim Munson
item.description: Wow - those are really striking! I know it's "not a competition" but those are some pretty sophisticated valentines. Y'all should be mighty proud of what you made.
item.content:encoded: Wow – those are really striking! I know it’s “not a competition” but those are some pretty sophisticated valentines. Y’all should be mighty proud of what you made.

item.title: By: Shauna Hannibal
item.dc:creator: Shauna Hannibal
item.description: Thanks for organizing, Sarah! It was especially adorable when we were joined by some students who asked, "do you do this every year?"
item.content:encoded: Thanks for organizing, Sarah! It was especially adorable when we were joined by some students who asked, “do you do this every year?”
